import React from "react"; import { Footer, Navbar } from "../components"; import { useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router'; const URL = "http://localhost:3305/api/abcd/order"; const Checkout = () => { const [order, setOrder] = useState({ firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", address: "", address2: "", country: "", state: "", zip: "", ccfname: "", ccnumber: "", ccexpiration: "", cccvv: "" }); const handleInput = (e) => { console.log(e); let name = e.target.name; let value = e.target.value; setUser({ ...order, [name]: value, }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log(user); try { const response = fetch(URL, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(user), }); if (response.ok) { const res_data = await response.json(); console.log("res from server", res_data); setUser( { firstName: "", lastName: "", email: "", address: "", address2: "", country: "", state: "", zip: "", ccfname: "", ccnumber: "", ccexpiration: "", cccvv: "" } ); navigate("./login"); } console.log(response); } catch (error) { console.log("register", error); } } const state = useSelector((state) => state.handleCart); const EmptyCart = () => { return (

No item in Cart

); }; const ShowCheckout = () => { let subtotal = 0; let shipping = 30.0; let totalItems = 0; state.map((item) => { return (subtotal += item.price * item.qty); }); state.map((item) => { return (totalItems += item.qty); }); return ( <>
Order Summary
  • Products ({totalItems})${Math.round(subtotal)}
  • Shipping ${shipping}
  • Total amount
    ${Math.round(subtotal + shipping)}

); }; export default Checkout;
